paper_abstract: Surge arresters constitute an indispensable aid to insulation coordination in power systems and they are the primary protection against different types of overvoltages (lightning or switching). They are generally connected in parallel with the equipment to be protected to divert the surge currents. The paper presents an approach to teaching high-voltage laboratory using specially designed exercises that can be done using MATLAB R2007. This paper presents a MATLAB-based technology to simulate residual voltage test, long duration withstand test, and operating duty test on arresters. Evaluation of the simulation with more than 30 students is very positive in terms of their developing confidence in and understanding of this simulation. (c) 2010 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 20: 391399, 2012
paper_title: Teaching current tests on surge arresters to undergraduate students using MATLAB-SIMULINK
